recreation noun
(MAKING/MADE AGAIN)
[ C or U ] the act of making something exist or happen again: a recreation of one of the most famous events in history The evening will be devoted to stand-up comedy, not the re-creation of classic skits.
[ C ] something that has been made or done to be the same as something that happened or existed in the past: From this opening tune, it was clear that hers would not be a historically obsessed re-creation. The rest of the collection is arranged in a horseshoe around a re-creation of a drive-in movie theatre.
